channel.title: Daniel, Tony S. on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Daniel, Tony S. on Chege's Blog

item.title: Batman Vol. 1: Their Dark Designs
item.description: Batman: Vol. 1: Their Dark Designs. Credits: dc.com Batman: Vol. 1: Their Dark Designs. James Tynion IV; Guillem March; Tomeu Morey. www.dc.com . www.hoopladigital.com . Tynion IV’s Department of Truth is entertaining in its treatment of truth. Coming in with a bit of bias for Tynion IV’s writing. Snapshots [Batman] It happened in the little moments. I’d sketch on the edge of a napkin, or at the corner of a page in an old casebook.
